OR_WORDLIST: alebo slovník napr.: ísť mama jedlo ...
SERVER_ASKS_FOR_YOUR_PLAINTEXT_PASSWORD: Server požaduje Vaše heslo v nekryptovanej (plaintext) podobe
ACCEPTING_THIS_WILL_SEND_YOUR_PLAIN_PASS: Akceptovaním pošlete svoje nekryptované heslo na Server, toto by malo byť povolené iba ak používate LDAP, alebo podobné autentifikačné metódy. Môžete to tiež zamietnuť, ale môže to viesť k chybe autentifikácie.
ENTER_YOUR_YUBIKEY_OTP_TOKEN: Prosím zadajte Váš YubiKey OTP Token
APPROVE_THE_PUSH_NOTIFICATION: Povoľte push notifikácie na Vašom telefóne, alebo poskytnite Váš Duo kód
ENTER_YOUR_GOOGLE_AUTHENTICATOR_CODE: Prosím zadajte svoj Google Authenticator kód
THE_SIGNATURE_OF_THE_SERVER_CHANGED: Podpis Servera sa zmenil. Ak ste nemenili Server, môže to znamenať, že Vaše spojenie bolo napadnuté.
IT_APPEARS_THAT_YOU_WANT_TO_CONNECT: Zdá sa, že sa chcete pripojiť k tomuto Serveru prvý krát. Prosím overte si odtlačok Servera pred potvrdením.
HERE_YOU_CAN_MANAGE_ALL_YOUR_PASSWORD_DA: Tu môžete spravovať všetky Vaše úložiská hesiel
EARLIER_GENERATED_RECOVERY_CODES: Ak ste mali vygenerované kódy pre obnovenie, boli práve prepísané novými!
SAVE_INFORMATION_TO_RECOVER: Prosím uložte si tieto informácie na obnovu strateného hesla.
OVERVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Prehľad Vášho účtu s podrobnosťami ako napr. Váš verejný kľúč.
CHANGE_E_MAIL_DESCRIPTION: Tu môžete poskytnúť svoj nový email (spolu so svojím aktuálnym heslom pre overenie).
CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Tu môžete poskytnúť svoje nové heslo (spolu so svojím aktuálnym heslom pre overenie).
GENERATE_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_DESCRIPTION: Mali by ste si vytvoriť kód pre obnovenie hesla, pre prípad, že zabudnete svoje heslo.
MULTIFACTOR_AUTHENTICATION_DESCRIPTION: Druhý faktor je ideálne zlepšenie zabezpečenia Vášho účtu.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Ak chcete zmazať svoj účet, môžete to urobiť tu. Pozor, všetky Vaše dáta na Serveri budú zmazané.
YOU_ARE_ABOUT_TO_DELETE_YOUR_ACCOUNT: Chystáte sa zmazať Váš účet. Táto akcia je nevratná. Všetky Vaše dáta budú vymazané!
NAME: Meno
EXPORT_DESCRIPTION: Exportovať dáta napr. pre offline zálohu.
IMPORT_DESCRIPTION: Importovať dáta z prehliadačov, alebo manažérov hesiel.
KNOWN_HOSTS_DESCRIPTION: Tu môžete spravovať kľúče všetkých Servrov, ku ktorým ste sa niekedy pripojili.
SESSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Zoznam všetkých potencionálne aktívnych relácií a zariadení nájdete nižšie.
REMOVE_USERNAME_FROM_PASSWORD: Nezadávajte do hesla svoje užívateľské meno
SET_LONGER_OR_MORE_COMPLEX_PASSWORD: Nastavte si dlhšie, alebo komplexnejšie heslo
DO_NOT_USE_PASSWORDS_TWICE: Zmeňte si heslo, nepoužívajte to isté heslo viac krát.
PASSWORD_HAS_BEEN_COMPROMISED_MULTIPLE_T: Zmeňte si heslo, bolo prelomené {{ pwned }} krát.
ANALYSIS_CAN_TAKE_SEVERAL_MINUTES: Táto analýza môže zabrať aj niekoľko minút.
SECURITY_REPORT_GOAL: Cieľom tohoto Psono reportu je zvýšiť Vaše bezpečnostné povedomie. Zanalyzujeme všetky Vaše heslá do sily a komplexity, dáme Vám návrhy ako zvýšiť bezpečnosť Vašich hesiel a ktoré heslá zmeniť. V tomto procese prejdeme všetky Vaše heslá uložené na servri, dešifrujeme a zanalyzujeme ich vo Vašom prehliadači.
CONSIDER_ENABLING_MULTIFACTOR_AUTHENTICA: Zvážte prosím použitie viacfaktorovej autentifikácie nakoľko to podstatne zvýši bezpečnosť Vášho účtu.
CONSIDER_ENABLING_RECOVERY_CODES: Zvážte prosím vytvorenie obnovovacieho kódu pre prípad zabudnutého hesla.
SYMBOL_IN_THE_TOP_RIGHT: symbol v pravom hornom rohu pre začiatok.
RIGHT_CLICK_HERE_TO_CREATE_ONE: Kliknite sem pravým tlačidlom pre vytvorenie
WE_GENERATE_YOUR_GPG_KEYS_PLEASE_WAIT: Generujeme Vaše GPG kľúče. Môže to trvať aj niekoľko minút, podľa výkonu Vášho zariadenia.
NAME_AND_EMAIL_ADDRESS_WILL_BE_PUBLICLY_: Meno a emailová adresa budu verejne dostupné. Emailová adresa nemôže byť falošná pokiaľ chcete, aby ľudia mohli Vašu správu aj dešifrovať. Meno môže byť čokoľvek, podľa čoho Vás môžu ľudia neskôr nájsť. Pre teraz odporúčame použiť Vaše skutočné meno.
YOUR_KEYS_PASSPHRASE: Your key's passphrase (if it's password protected)
URL_FILTER_EG: URL filter napr. jozko.sk, alebo maly.jozko.sk
TITLE: Popis
SCAN_THE_CODE_THEN_CLICK_HERE: Naskenujte kód a potom kliknite sem
ADMINISTRATOR_REQUIRES_SECOND_FACTOR: Váš administrátor požaduje nastavenie dvojfaktorovej autentifikácie. Prosím zvoľte si poskytovateľa.
YOUR_TRUSTED_USER_LIST_IS_EMPTY: Zoznam dôveryhodných užívateľov je prázdny. Pravým klikom môžete pridať užívateľa do svojho zoznamu.
OR_PROVIDE_THE_PUBLIC_KEY_MANUALLY_INCLU: alebo poskytnite verejný kľúč manuálne, vrátane
YOU_NEVER_CONFIRMED_THIS_USERS_IDENTITY: Ešte ste nepotvrdili identitu užívateľa. Prosím požiadajte užívateľa bezpečným spôsobom, či je to naozaj jeho (jej) verejný kľúč. Ak ste si potvrdili, že tento verejný kľúč je správny a chcete ho pridať medzi dôveryhodné, prosím kliknite sem:
PICK_ONE_SERVER_BELOW_OR_ENTER_URL: Pick one of the servers below or enter the new URL
CLIENT_STORES_SECRETS_IN_LOCAL_STORAGE: Klient uloží všetky dáta (heslá, poznámky, záložky, ...) v lokálnej pamäti Vášho prehliadača. Všetky dáta budú pred odoslaním na Server zašifrované Vašim heslom. Súbory nie sú sťahované.
THE_CLIENT_IS_DOWNLOADING_ALL_CONTENT: The client is now downloading all necessary content from the server.
PASSWORD_CHANGE_LOGOUT_OTHER_DEVICES: You have changed your passwords. We advise you to log out all other devices!
IT_IS_IMPOSSIBLE_TO_REVERT_DELETE_DATAST: Toto je nezvratná operácia! Vymazanie úložiska je trvalé a všetok obsah už nebude naďalej dostupný!
MANIFEST_APP_DESC: Psono Password Manager, store and share your passwords securely.
WEBSTORE_MAIN_DESCRIPTION:
Používa sa pre bezpečné vytváranie, uchovávanie a zdieľanie hesiel s ostatnými, na rôznych zariadeniach. Nemusíte už používať to isté heslo viac krát. Žiadne heslo neopustí Váš prehliadač nezašifrované. 
Prehľad bezpečnostných technológií nájdete na https://psono.com/security/
Prehľad funkcionalít Psono nájdete na https://psono.com/features-for-users
DO_YOU_WANT_TO_SAVE_THIS_PASSWORD: Do you want to save this password?
EMERGENCY_CODE_ACTIVATED: Emergency code activation countdown started. You can log in once the countdown is finished. Please repeat this step in:
EMERGENCY_CODE_WAITING: The emergency code activation countdown has already been started. You can log in once the countdown is finished. Please repeat this step in:
WARNING_OF_EMERGENCY_CODE: Everybody with this information can access your passwords. Please give this information only to trustworthy people and ask them to store this information securely.
INFO_FOR_EMERGENCY_CODE: Hi, with the information below you can access my password safe if something happens to me. Please put this information somewhere safe.
SEND_THIS_EMERGENCY_INFORMATION_INFO: Send the information below to the person that you trust.
LEAD_TIME_IN_HOURS_PLACEHOLDER: Time till this code will grant access to your passwords.
PERSON_YOU_GIVE_THIS_CODE_TO_EG_SISTER: Person you give this code to, e.g., sister
EMERGENCY_CODES_DESCRIPTION: Emergency Codes allow other trustworthy people (e.g., your parents or wife) to log in on your behalf if something happens to you. In contrast to recovery codes, the other person has to wait a bit before the code will grant access. Furthermore, you will be informed once someone activates such a code giving you the chance to prevent this action.
EXPORT_HAS_BEEN_DISABLED: The server administrator has disabled the export feature. Please talk to your administrator.
API_KEY_DETAIL_EXPLANATION: Tu sú všetky parametre API kľúča
DELETE_ENTRY_WARNING: You are about to delete this entry. If this entry is a share and you'd like it to be removed for others as well, remove share rights first before removing this entry. Are you sure?
DELETE_FOLDER_WARNING:
Chystáte sa zmazať priečinok vrátane jeho obsahu. Pokiaľ je tento priečinok zdieľaný, alebo obsahuje dáta, ktoré sú zdieľané, budú zmazané spolu s ním. 
Ste si istý týmto krokom?
DELETE_API_KEY_WARNING: You are about to delete an API key. All people and applications using this API key will lose access. Are you sure?
LEAVE_GROUP_WARNING: You are about to leave the group. You will lose access to shares that belong to the group. Are you sure?
API_KEY_INSECURE_USAGE_WARNING: You are about to allow this key to use insecure methods. With this, it's possible to access secrets without the complexity of additional transport encryption or the need to decrypt passwords locally. You should only allow this if you cannot use the official console client and have to use simpler clients (e.g., curl).
API_KEY_NOT_RESTRICTED_TO_SECRETS_WARNIN: You removed the restriction for specific secrets. As a consequence, this API key will have complete access to your account.
HERE_YOU_CAN_MANAGE_ALL_YOUR_API_KEYS: Here you can manage all your API keys
API_KEYS_HAVE_BEEN_DISABLED: The server administrator has disabled API keys. Please talk to your administrator.
INFO_NO_READ_RIGHTS_FOR_FILE_REPOSITORY_: You do not have the necessary permissions to view the configuration of this data repository.
INFO_NO_GRANT_RIGHTS_FOR_FILE_REPOSITORY: You do not have the necessary permissions to edit other users' rights.
USER_HAS_ALREADY_RIGHTS_FOR_FILE_REPOSIT: The user already has other rights for this file repository
SELECT_EITHER_SHARD_OR_REPOSITORY: You have to select either a file repository or shard as the target (not both)
DELETE_FILE_REPOSITORY_WARNING: You are about to delete this file repository. All data that has been uploaded there will be lost. This action is irreversible. Are you sure?
DELETE_FILE_REPOSITORY_RIGHT_WARNING: You are about to delete the rights to this file repository. You will lose the capability to upload files to this repository. This action is irreversible. Are you sure?
FILE_REPOSITORIES_HAVE_BEEN_DISABLED: The server administrator has disabled file repositories. Please talk to your administrator.
HERE_YOU_CAN_MANAGE_ALL_YOUR_FILE_REPOSI: Here you can manage all your file repositories
CHUNK_NOT_AVAILABLE: Chunk not available. Please try again later.
NO_PERMISSION_OR_NOT_EXIST: No permission or it does not exist.
INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS_WITH_CREDIT_BUY_ADDRE: Insufficient funds, you can buy some here:
TO_VERIFY_PUBLIC_KEY: To verify that this is the user you want to share data with, ask the user if this is really his or her public key.
BEFORE_ACTIVATION_LOGOUT: You are currently logged in. Before activating another account, please log out.
REGISTRATION_FAILED_USERNAME_AND_EMAIL_H: Registration failed. Username and email have to match.
REGISTRATION_EMAIL_DELIVERY_FAILED: Registration email delivery failed. Account not created.
PASSWORD_RESET_HAS_BEEN_DISABLED: The password reset functionality has been disabled.
USER_NOT_PART_OF_REQUIRED_GROUP: Your account is not part of one of the authorized groups.
LOGIN_INFO_CANNOT_BE_DECRYPTED: Login information could not be decrypted by the server.
SAML_TOKEN_NOT_FOUND_ALREADY_USED_OR_EXP: SAML token not found, already used or expired.
DELETE_GROUP_WARNING: You are about to delete the group. All shares will be lost or become inaccessible. Are you sure?
USERNAME_VALIDATION_NAME_CONTAINS_INVALI: Usernames may only contain letters, numbers, periods, and dashes.
ACCOUNT_DELETION_DISABLED: User accounts cannot be deleted on this server
EITHER_SECRET_OR_FILE_REQUIRED_NOT_BOTH: Either secret or file required, not both
VALID_TILL_CANNOT_BE_IN_THE_PAST: 'Valid till' cannot be in the past.
INFO_PUBLIC_TITLE_WILL_BE_VISIBLE: The public title will be shown, e.g., before the user enters the passphrase.
PASSPHRASE_MISSMATCH: Passphrase and repetition do not match.
SHARE_LINK_PASSPHRASE_INFO: Enter a passphrase to protect the link secret. Leave empty for no protection.
INFO_HOW_LONG_CAN_LINK_SHARE_BE_USED: How long can this link be used? Leave empty for no restriction.
INFO_HOW_OFTEN_CAN_LINK_SHARE_BE_USED: How often can this link be used? Leave empty for no restriction.
USERNAME_OR_PASSWORD_WRONG: Login declined. Maybe wrong username or password.
SERVER_OFFLINE_DETAILS: Mali sme problém s pripojením. Prosím skontrolujte svoje pripojenie k sieti a adresu Servra. Server je offline.
NO_PUBLIC_KEY_FOUND_FOR_EMAIL: No public key found for this email.
PUBLIC_KEY_MISSING_TAGS: Public key does not contain either the starting or finishing tag.
PRIVATE_KEY_MISSING_TAGS: Private key does not contain either the starting or finishing tag.
PRIVATE_KEY_CONTAINS_MULTIPLE_KEYS: Sorry, but your private key contains more than one private key.
PUBLIC_KEY_CONTAINS_MULTIPLE_KEYS: Sorry, but your public key contains more than one public key.
AT_LEAST_ONE_CODE_INCORRECT: At least one of your codes is wrong.
ADVISE_PASSWORD_TOO_OLD: Zmeňte si heslo, je príliš staré.
ADMINISTRATOR_REQUIRES_SECOND_FACTOR_GO_: Your administrator requires that you set up a second factor. Please use the web interface of the website to configure one.
PICK_SECOND_FACTOR: Pick one of the following second factor options
PASSWORD_INCORRECT_SERVER_DECLINED_SECUR: The provided password was incorrect. The server therefore declined the security report. Please try again.
SECURITY_REPORT_REQUIRED: Your administrator requires you to create a new security report before you can access your datastore again. Please create a new one.
SECURITY_REPORT_SOON_REQUIRED: Your administrator requires you soon to create a new security report. You can create one now preemptive.
SEND_SECURITY_REPORT_TO_SERVER: Poslať bezpečnostný report na Váš Server?
USER_DISABLED_ASK_ADMIN_TO_ENABLE: User has been disabled. Contact an administrator to enable it.
USER_WITH_EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: User with the specified email address already exists.
USER_WITH_USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: User with the specified username already exists.
AUTOFILL_SERVICE_ACTIVATE_NOW_INFO: To use the full feature set of the app, you should activate Psono's autofill service. You can do so by clicking the button below or skip this step.
HANDSHAKE_ERROR_DETAILS: Nebolo možné zabezpečiť bezpečné spojenie so Serverom. Chyba vo validácii SSL certifikátu.
UNKNOWN_ERROR_CHECK_BROWSER_CONSOLE: Neznáma chyba. Prosím skontrolujte konzolu vo svojom prehliadači.
USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST_PROBABLY_DELETED: Užívateľ nebol nájdený na Servri. Pravdepodobne bol zmazaný. Môžete ho zmazať z Dôveryhodných užívateľov a skúsiť znovu.
EMAIL_DOMAIN_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_REGISTER: Email domain not allowed for registration.
ACTIVATION_CODE_INCORRECT: Activation code incorrect or account already activated.
SERVER_NOT_SUPPORT_DUO: The server does not support Duo 2-Factor.
SERVER_NOT_SUPPORT_GA: The server does not support TOTP.
SERVER_NOT_SUPPORT_YUBIKEY: The server does not support Yubikeys.
DELETE_OWN_SHARE_RIGHT_WARNING: You are about to delete your own share right. You will lose all rights to this share. Are you sure?
MAINTENANCE_MODE_ACTIVE: Server under maintenance and temporarily not available.
TOGGLE_OWN_GRANT_RIGHT_WARNING: You are about to revoke your own permission to change the permissions of users for this share. Make sure that someone else has grant rights before revoking your own. Are you sure you want to continue?
DELETE_ENTRY_PERMANENT_WARNING: You are about to permanently delete this entry. This action cannot be reversed. Are you sure?
DELETE_FOLDER_PERMANENT_WARNING:
Chystáte sa zmazať priečinok a všetok jeho obsah. Táto akcia je nevratná.
Ste si istý?
DISABLE_BROWSER_PM: Automatic disabling of the browser's built-in password manager
RIGHT_TO_READ: Right to read (allows all GET operations)
RIGHT_TO_WRITE: Right to write (allows all PUT, POST, and DELETE operations)
NEW_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_CODE_WARNING: You are about to generate a new recovery code. The new recovery code will replace earlier codes, so old codes won't work anymore. Are you sure?
INCLUDE_TRASH_BIN_ENTRIES: Include entries from the trash bin
TOGGLE_OWN_GROUP_ADMIN_WARNING: You are about to revoke your own group admin permission for this group. Make sure that someone else has group admin before revoking your own. Are you sure you want to continue?
GROUP_NAME_TOO_SHORT: The group's name is too short.
USE_HKP_OR_PROVIDE_THE_PUBLIC_KEY_MANUAL: Use the HKP search function or provide the public key manually, including -----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK----- and -----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----
PLEASE_REMOVE_RECEIVERS_WITHOUT_PUBLIC_K: Please remove receivers that have no public key.
CLICK_ON_THE_SYMBOL_IN_THE_TOP_RIGHT_COR:
Click on the
<2>
symbol in the top right corner to start.
DECRYPTION_OF_EXPORT_FAILED_WRONG_PASSWO: Decryption of the export failed. You most likely provided the wrong password.
ENTER_PASSWORD_IF_YOUR_EXPORT_IS_ENCRYPT: Enter the password that was used to encrypt your export. Leave the input field empty if your export is not encrypted.
ENTER_PASSWORD_TO_ENCRYPT_YOUR_EXPORT: Enter a password to encrypt your export. If you don't enter a password, the export won't be encrypted.
WEBAUTHN_FIDO2_TOKEN_NOT_FOUND_FOR_THIS_: FIDO2 / WebAuthn token not found for this origin
CONFIGURE_MULTIPLE_ACCOUNTS_WITH_GRANT_P: Configure multiple accounts with admin privileges to be able to modify the permissions of the share in case of a lost admin password or resigned administrator.
PERMISSIONS_TO_ACCESS_THIS_ENTRY_HAVE_BE: Permission to access this entry has been denied.
PROVIDED_DOMAIN_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_REGISTRA: The provided domain in your username is not allowed for registration on this server.
OPERATION_IN_PROGRESS_PLEASE_WAIT: An operation is in progress, please wait and don't interrupt the process, don't close the browser, or reload the site.
SSH_KEY_GENERATION_EXPLAINED: The generator is using ed25519, an elliptic curve signing algorithm using EdDSA and Curve25519.
WE_GENERATE_YOUR_SSH_KEYS_PLEASE_WAIT: We are generating your SSH Keys now. This can take several minutes, depending on your hardware.
DATASTORE_DESCRIPTION_MUST_BE_UNIQUE: The description of a datastore must be unique. The chosen description is already used by another datastore.
RECEIVED_MALFORMED_RESPONSE: Received malformed response. Check that the server URL is correct. More details can be found in the developer console of the browser.
CREDIT_CARD_NUMBER_COPY_NOTIFICATION: Credit card number copied to clipboard
CREDIT_CARD_NAME_COPY_NOTIFICATION: Name on credit card copied to clipboard
CREDIT_CARD_EXPIRATION_DATE_COPY_NOTIFIC: Credit card expiration date copied to clipboard
CREDIT_CARD_CVC_COPY_NOTIFICATION: Credit card CVC copied to clipboard
CREDIT_CARD_PIN_COPY_NOTIFICATION: Credit card PIN copied to clipboard
ENTRY_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Adjust here the normally offered types for new entries. Types that are not selected will be hidden.
LOGOUT_SUCCESSFUL: You have successfully logged out. You can close the window now or log in again.
CHROME_EXPORT_OPEN_THE_FOLLOWING_IN_YOUR: Open the following line in your address bar and activate the export function:
CHROME_EXPORT_AFTERWARDS_OPEN_THE_FOLLOW: Afterwards, open the following line in your address bar and export all passwords as a file, then upload it here:
NEXTCLOUD_EXPORT_EXTRACT_ZIP_AND_UPLOAD_: When exporting from Nextcloud, please unzip the zip file and upload the Passwords.csv file it contains here.
NO_PASSKEY_FOUND_FOR_THIS_WEBSITE: The authentication failed because we haven't found a passkey for this website.
WEBSITE_WANTS_TO_AUTHENTICATE_WITH_PASSK: This website requests authentication with a passkey. Do you want to allow it?
NOT_LOGGED_IN_PLEASE_SIGN_IN_TO_USE_FUNC: You are currently not logged in. You need to sign in to use this functionality.
WEBSITE_WANTS_TO_CREATE_NEW_PASSKEY_ALLO: This website wants to create a new passkey. Do you want to allow it?
YUBICO_TOKEN_VALID_BUT_NOT_CONFIGURED: Yubikey valid, yet not configured within this account.
IP_ADDRESS_NOT_ALLOWED: Your IP address is not allowed to connect.
FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED_SERVER_REQUIRES_UP: Feature not supported. The server requires an update.
FILE_MUST_BE_SMALLER_THAN_KB: The file must be smaller than {{filesize}}KB.
FILE_MUST_BE_PIXEL_BIG: The file must be {{filedimension_x}} x {{filedimension_y}} pixels.
SERVER_INFO_DESCRIPTION: The overview of your server with details like its version or public key.
ENTER_PASSWORD_TO_DECRYPT_YOUR_DATASTORE: Your datastore is protected by a separate password, which is necessary to access your data.
ADMINISTRATOR_REQUIRES_ACCOUNT_SWITCH_TO: You need to provide an encryption password to enable client-side encryption for added security. This means that your sensitive data, such as passwords, will now be encrypted locally on your device before being sent to our servers.

We are migrating your authentication method from client-side encryption to server-side encryption. This means that the server keeps a backup of your keys for a smoother user experience and quicker assistance when needed.
CONFIRM_DELETION_OF_SELECTED_ENTRIES_DET: You are about to move multiple entries to your trash bin. Are you sure you want to do that?
ONLY_ONE_IVALT_MOBILE_ALLOWED: You already have an iVALT mobile number registered with your account. Please remove that iVALT mobile number from your account first.
ENTER_MOBILE_NUMBER_REGISTERED_WITH_IVAL: Please enter your mobile number registered with iVALT
IVALT_REQUEST_SENT_TO_APP: Request has been sent to your iVALT app
IVALT_AUTH_TIMEOUT: iVALT Auth timed out. Please try again
SOUTH_GEORGIA_AND_THE_SOUTH_SANDWICH_ISL: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
MACEDONIA_THE_FORMER_YUGOSLAV_REPUBLIC_O: Macedonia, the Former Yugoslav Republic of
PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT_MIN_REQUIRED: Password too short, you need at least {{ min_password_length }} characters.
PASSWORD_NOT_COMPLEX_ENOUGH_MIN_REQUIRED: Password not complex enough, you need at least {{ character_groups }} different character groups.
REGISTER_AND_GAIN_ACCESS_TO_THE_FOLLOWIN: Register and gain access to the following features for free:
NEED_MORE_HELP_CHECK_OUR_DOCUMENTATION: Need more help? Check out our documentation.
STEP_1_PIN_EXTENSION_T_BROWSER_TOOLBAR: Step 1: Pin the extension to your browser toolbar.
CLICK_PUZZLE_ICON_IN_BROWSER_TOOLBAR_AND: Click the puzzle icon in your browser's toolbar and pin the extension to make it easily accessible.
STEP_2_LOG_IN_OR_REGISTER_TO_START_USING: Step 2: Log in or register to start using the extension.
CLICK_EXTENSION_ICON_AND_LOG_IN_OR_REGIS: Click the extension icon and log in or register to activate your account.
SUCCESS_ONLY_A_FEW_MORE_STEPS: Success! Only a few more steps...
YOU_HAVE_SUCCESSFULLY_INSTALLED_THE_EXTE: You’ve successfully installed the extension. Now, let's get everything set up.
THE_VERSION_OF_THE_SERVER_IS_TOO_OLD_AND: The version of the server is too old. This client doesn't support the old version anymore. Please update your server or tell your administrator to update it.
TO_TAKE_YOUR_PASSWORDS_WHEREVER_YOU_GO_D: To take your passwords wherever you go download the app.
TO_IMPROVE_YOUR_EXPERIENCE_DOWNLOAD_THE_: To improve your experience download the browser extension.
YOU_CAN_NOW_LOGIN_AND_START_USING_THE_AP: You can login and start using Psono
SHOW_SAVE_MODE_TOGGLE: Display read-only mode toggle on the top bar
ITEM_UNSAVED_WARNING: You have unsaved changes. Press Return to continue editing or Discard to discard changes and close the entry.
UNREGISTRATION_CODE_INCORRECT: The link is incorrect or was already been used or has expired.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_INFO: You can request the deletion of your user account here. Please provide either your username or email address, and you'll receive an email with a link to complete the account deletion.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_WARNING: You are about to delete your account. Are you sure you want to proceed? Deleting your account is a permanent action and cannot be undone. All of your data, settings, and personal information will be permanently removed, and you will lose access to all services associated with your account. If you’re sure, please confirm below. If not, you may cancel and continue using your account as usual.
UNREGISTRATION_EMAIL_DELIVERY_FAILED: Email delivery failed. Please get in touch with your administrator to manually delete the account.
BEFORE_DELETION_LOGOUT: You are currently logged in. Before deleting your account, please log out.
WARNING_USER_DETAILS_CHANGED: The cryptographic details for this user have changed. Verify their identity to ensure security.
USE_FORM_TO_SEARCH_USER: Use the form to search for a user.
URL_EMPTY_CANNOT_REDIRECT: The URL parameter is missing, so we’re unable to redirect you. Please modify the entry and provide a valid URL.
CLIPBOARD_CLEAR_DELAY_EXPLAINED: The duration before the clipboard is automatically cleared after being used for copying. A value of '0' disables the feature.
VERIFY_USER_IDENTITY_EXPLAINED: The server has provided the cryptographic details for the requested user. Use a secondary channel, such as email or SMS, to contact the user and confirm the details' accuracy. Once verified, click the 'Add' button below to securely store the user and their details in your tamper-proof trusted user datastore.
SEARCH_USER_EXPLAINED: We are going to query the server for the cryptographic identity of a user.
